entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
